SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.model

Class ClientModelGUI

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
it.polimi.ingsw.client.model.ClientModelGUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientModel, ClientRemote, Serializable, Remote
public class ClientModelGUI extends UnicastRemoteObject implements ClientModel, ClientRemote
For the general behaviour please refer to the javadoc of ClientController. This object is used to wrap the GUI and call the proper methods of JavaFX.
See Also:
